title: 45- SCOTUS without RBG
description: On September 18th, Ruth Bader Ginsburg died at the age of 87. She was a trailblazing jurist who fought for the equality of women before the law. But her legacy is in peril, as Donald Trump and Senate Republicans prepare to nominate a conservative successor. What can Democrats do to alter the course of the SCOTUS? And what does the constitution tell us about so-called ‘judicial supremacy’?
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)

And what does the constitution tell us about so-called ‘judicial supremacy’?
